query:
select
                    max(abs(
                        case $3
                            when 'p_value' then dms.p_value
                            when 'log2_fold_change' then dms.log2_fold_change
                            when 'statistic' then dms.statistic
                        end
                    ))
                from dms
                join proteins on dms.protein_id = proteins.id
                where proteins.protein = $1 and dms.condition = $2;
